text: Yeni Rize Şehir Stadium is a multi-use stadium in Rize, Turkey. It is currently used mostly for football matches and is the home ground of Çaykur Rizespor. The stadium has a capacity of 15,197 spectators and it opened in 2009. It replaced Rize Atatürk Stadium as the home of Çaykur Rizespor. Category:Football venues in Turkey Category:Sports venues in Rize Category:Çaykur Rizespor Category:Sports venues completed in 2009
title: Yeni Rize Şehir Stadium
